item.title: Aspose.Drawing for Java 24.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Drawing for Java 24.1. Improvements and Changes Changed classification from JDK 1.6 to JDK 1.8. Added support for loading 48-bit PNG (DRAWINGJAVA-76) Added support for loading GIF with minimal table size (DRAWINGJAVA-78) Added support for loading BMP with unpadded row size (DRAWINGJAVA-79) Improved ColorConverter correctness (DRAWINGJAVA-57) Improved InstalledFontCollection correctness (DRAWINGJAVA-91)
